name: Efigil Corp
overview:
Established in 2001 with a proven track record in wholesale distribution, marketing and sales of licensed Formula1 products. We are the importer-exporter & wholesale distributor of licensed Ferrari Bicycles, Baby Gears, Ferrari R/C cars and Ferrari Helmets (For Macau, part of Wynn Hotels Las Vegas). We are also under consideration by Puma NA to carry the Puma-Ferrari Brand as a distributor and or representative to market their product to our specialty stores customers (baby gear). We supply Ferrari Dealers, Ferrari Stores, Ferrari Boutique Stores and Formula1 Specialty Stores in North & South America. With our warehouse facilities in Miami, California & Texas, we are able to drop-ship products to our customers.

Warehouses: Miami, Florida Carson, California Dallas, Texas

Distribution Market: USA, Canada, Mexico and some overseas Countries

Manufacturer â€“ Teamtex France, Teamtex USA License Ferrari Helmets-Wholesale Distributor Manufacturer- New Max

Customers: Major account (mass merchandisers, Dept. Stores), Specialty shops, Ferrari dealers of North America, Ferrari Store USA, Distributors and Retailers

Sales Projections: We expect this year about 2.5 Mil (could be much more!) with baby gear products and about 2 mil. other products like Ferrari Bikes and Ferrari RC products and Ferrari Designer Helmets.
